recipesJson.name: Tammy's Temptation
recipesJson.author: R2ME2
recipesJson.description: I mixed this on a whim for a friend who loves cool cinnaminty vapes.  Its surprisingly addictive. The mix of peppermints creates a nice minty base and cinnamon red hots  blends it all together.  You can use Arctic winter, polar blast, WS-23 or Koolada as the cooling agent, adjust the percentage accordingly.  I opted to use two to get the perfect cooling effect without overpowering everything else.  Hope you enjoy as much as she does!
